Loved by users. Approved by legal

AI tools are great, until compliance says no. Synthesia has the security, control, and credibility your IT team needs to say yes, fast.

Learn more about security

Synthesia runs your whole video workflow

Most AI tools stop at creation. Synthesia supports the full workflow—create, collaborate, and publish video in one secure, scalable platform.

People-first AI. No shortcuts, no gray areas.

Some AI tools cut corners. We don’t. Every Synthesia avatar is created with explicit consent, and every video is moderated to prevent misuse.

Learn more about AI Ethics

Using AI, we’re radically changing the process of video content creation, making it scalable and affordable while maintaining high quality.
